alert.note: Alert for Columbia; McDuffie; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 9:45AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of McDuffie, southwestern Columbia and southwestern Richmond Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 945 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gibson, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thomson, Harlem, Thomson-McDuffie County Airport, Wrightsboro, Blythe, Dearing, Leitner Lake Conference Center, Sweetwater Park, Arties Pond Public Fishing Area, McDuffie County Fire Department, Adamsville, Thomson Fire Department, Pea Patch Aerodrome, McDuffie Regional Medical Center, University Hospital McDuffie, White Oak Campground, Boneville, Autney and Ansley Mill. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 167 and 180. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
